title: Hey, Soul Sister
lyrics:
[intro] (C) Hey-(G)ay, hey-ay-ay-ay-(Am)ay, hey-ay-ay-ay-(F)ay
 
Your (C)lipstick stains (G) on the front lobe of my (Am)left side brains
(F) I knew I wouldn't for(C)get you and so I went and (G)let you blow my (Am)mind (F)  (G)
Your (C)sweet moonbeam (G) the smell of you in every (Am)single dream I dream
(F) I knew when we col(C)lided you're the one I have de(G)cided who's one of my (Am)kind (F)  (G)
 
(F)Hey soul sister (G)ain't that mister (C)mister (G)on the (F)radio stereo
The (G)way you move aint (C)fair you (G)know
(F)Hey soul sister (G)I don't want to (C)miss a (G)single (F)thing you do (G - pause)
To(C)night hey-(G)ay, hey-ay-Ay-ay-(Am)ay, hey-ay-Ay-ay-(F)ay
 
(C)Just in ti-i-i-ime (G) I'm so glad you have a (Am)one track mind like (F)me
You gave my love di(C)rection a game show love con(G)nection we can't de(Am)ny-i-(F)iii (G)
I'm (C)so obsessed (G) my heart is bound to beat right (Am)outta my untrimmed (F)chest
I believe in (C)you like a virgin you're Ma(G)donna
And I'm always gonna (Am)wanna blow your (F)mind  (G)
 
(F)Hey soul sister (G)ain't that mister (C)mister (G)on the (F)radio stereo
The (G)way you move aint (C)fair you (G)know
(F)Hey soul sister (G)I don't want to (C)miss a (G)single (F)thing you do (G) [no pause]
To(C)night, the way you can't cut a rug
(G)Watching you's the only drug I need
(Am) You're so gangster I'm so thug
You're the (F)only one I'm (G)dreaming of you see
(C) I can be myself now finally
(G) In fact there's nothing I can't (Am)be
I want the world to see you (F) be with (G) me
 
(F)Hey soul sister (G)ain't that mister (C)mister (G)on the (F)radio stereo
The (G)way you move aint (C)fair you (G)know
(F)Hey soul sister (G)I don't want to (C)miss a (G)single (F)thing you do (G)
To(C)night hey-(G)ay, hey-ay-Ay-ay-(Am)ay, hey-ay-Ay-ay-(F)ay  x2
To(C-single strum)night [end]
